holidays.title: National Potato Chip Day
holidays.description: On National Potato Chip Day, this snack will be enjoyed by millions  across the country.

holidays.title: Pi Day
holidays.description: Channel your inner math geek and prepare to eat and celebrate everybody's favorite never-ending number.

holidays.title: Bake a Pie in Solidarity Day
holidays.description: Grab your forks and knives, and get ready for a feast of pies.

holidays.title: Celebrate Scientists Day
holidays.description: Please spare a moment to show gratitude to scientists worldwide for their essential service to humanity.

holidays.title: Constitution Day in Andorra
holidays.description: Explore the history and significance of the sixth-smallest nation in Europe — Andorra.

holidays.title: Crowdfunding Day
holidays.description: Ready to channel your energy and abilities into crowdfunding for a cause or your business?

holidays.title: Dribble to Work Day
holidays.description: Today is all about women’s sports — especially basketball. Join in the fun as we create awareness.

holidays.title: Equal Pay Day
holidays.description: Learn about the history of the long struggle for equality and how it carries on today.

holidays.title: Genius Day
holidays.description: We celebrate the life and legacy of Albert Einstein this Genius Day.

holidays.title: International Ask a Question Day
holidays.description: Today is dedicated to all your questions of who, when, what, how, and why!

holidays.title: International Day of Action For Rivers
holidays.description: Let’s celebrate, learn and explore the importance of rivers in this world!

holidays.title: International Day of Mathematics
holidays.description: Join us as we delve into the amazing and complex world of mathematics!

holidays.title: Legal Assistance Day
holidays.description: Bring up your legal problems on Legal Assistance Day and get them solved!

holidays.title: Legal Assistants Day
holidays.description: We thank the legal assistants who support lawyers and make significant contributions to the legal system.

holidays.title: National Children's Craft Day
holidays.description: Grab some art supplies for your little ones and spread the fun in your neighborhood.

holidays.title: National Dog Theft Awareness Day
holidays.description: Don’t be a victim of dog theft. Protect your fur babies from criminals.

holidays.title: National Learn About Butterflies Day
holidays.description: Get ready to celebrate and learn more about these delightful, colorful insects!

holidays.title: National Organize Your Home Office Day
holidays.description: Put on your dusting gloves, as we get ready to flaunt our organizing skills!

holidays.title: National Save a Spider Day
holidays.description: Save the spiders today and take them outside in a jar rather than killing them.

holidays.title: National Valerie Day
holidays.description: Ever heard that Valerie can be a boy’s name, too? Learn the history here.

holidays.title: National Write Your Story Day
holidays.description: We want to hear your fascinating story, so why not write about it?

holidays.title: Science Education Day
holidays.description: Let’s get ready to celebrate the wonders of science this March 14.

holidays.title: White Day
holidays.description: In the mood for some love? Let’s go to Japan and celebrate White Day!

holidays.title: Albert Einstein’s Birthday
holidays.description: Called ‘The Genius’, most people doubt we’ll ever have another Albert Einstein among us again.

holidays.title: CookieSwirlC’s Birthday
holidays.description: CookieSwirlC is an entertaining YouTuber that makes us want to go back to our childhood days.

holidays.title: Dan Avidan’s Birthday
holidays.description: Musician, comedian, actor, singer-songwriter, show hoster – is there anything Dan Avidan can’t do?

holidays.title: Kash Doll’s Birthday
holidays.description: From working as a stripper to help her family, to becoming a celebrated rapper.

holidays.title: Sammi Giancola’s Birthday
holidays.description: This former MTV star keeps expanding her career, from television celebrity to launching her own business.

holidays.title: Stephen Curry’s Birthday
holidays.description: He is the greatest player of his generation; there are no limits to what this basketball star can achieve.
